items.author: Peter Phelan
items.content_html:
This blog has been setup as a training blog.

The is my first introductory post which will hopefully be the first of many. This site will catalog my journey through a multitude of training which I intend to undertake over the coming months

items.author: Peter Phelan
items.content_html:
